contextId.information: The words "large" and "mighty" share similar meanings here and emphasize the strength of the army. AT: "A huge swarm of locusts" (UDB) or "a very large human army." (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_metaphor]] and [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_doublet]])
the people of Israel, who are God's special people (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_metaphor]])
